text: The 2011 Aragon motorcycle Grand Prix was the fourteenth round of the 2011 Grand Prix motorcycle racing season. It took place on the weekend of 16–18 September 2011 at the Motorland Aragón circuit. ==MotoGP classification== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" ! Pos. ! No. ! Rider ! Team !
